description.value:
Trigger The pain milker is struck hard enough to take damage, or any of its dials and levers are adjusted carelessly

Effect The pain milker emits a shrill whine and exudes a blast of violet light. All creatures in area B2 must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save. This DC is reduced by 2 if the machine is broken.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[4d10[vitality]] or @Damage[4d10[void]] damage (whichever is more harmful).

Failure The creature takes @Damage[8d10[vitality]] or @Damage[8d10[void]] damage (whichever is more harmful) and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1}.

Critical Failure As failure but @Damage[16d10[vitality]] or @Damage[16d10[void]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}.

details.description: An eerie machine made of levers, crystals, and glowing bits of metal that, as one draws near, causes unsettling aches and pains.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:33] (master) to deactivate the machine, or @Check[type:perception|dc:38] (expert) to decipher the proper order in which the switches and dials should be adjusted in order to power the device down harmlessly
details.reset: If the augnagar still lives and at least one crystallized agony is still functional, the pain milker resets automatically in a number of rounds equal to 7 - the number of remaining crystallized agonies.
